Headline: #35 31st Temporary Reroute at 31st/Lock
ShortDescription: #35 31st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 31st, Loomis and Archer, due to, street blockage near 31st/Lock.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 31st, Loomis and Archer, due to, street blockage near 31st/Lock

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/55th
ShortDescription: Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temp. rerouted via Ashland, 55th, Damen, 59th, then resume their normal route on Damen, due to street blockage near Ashland/55th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 55th, Damen, 59th, then resume their normal route on Damen, due to street blockage near Ashland/55th.

Northbound buses are not affected.
